```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
no_grad <- read_csv("csv/stud-grad.csv")
no_grad <- tibble(no_grad)
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = no_grad) + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = campus, y = ss, color = college)) + 
  xlab("Campus") + 
  ylab("Number of Graduates") + 
  scale_x_discrete(labels=c("bay" = "Bayombong")) +
  scale_color_manual(labels = c("CFERM", "COE"))
```
